text: Carol Creighton Burnett (born April 26, 1933) is an American singer, writer, dancer, actress and comedian.https://www.usatoday.com/story/life/tv/2014/06/17/carol-burnett- hallmark-channel-signed-sealed-delivered/10654479/ USA Today She is notable for her stage and television acting. She began her career in New York. She had her own television program: The Carol Burnett Show (1967-1978 on CBS). Burnett was born in San Antonio, Texas in 1933. Burnett has won many awards. These include six Emmy Awards, five Golden Globes and a Tony. ==References== ==Other websites== * https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0000993/bio - IMDB * http://www.brainyquote.com/quotes/authors/c/carol_burnett.html - Carol Burnett Quotes Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Texas Category:Writers from Texas Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Comedians from Texas Category:Mark Twain Prize recipients Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:Actors from San Antonio, Texas
title: Carol Burnett
